Kaggle - San Francisco and REMOTE We're looking for:

* Developers (REMOTE)

* Product manager

* Data scientists

Kaggle is a platform for data science competitions, that is changing the way data science is done. We've already solved problems for NASA, Wikipedia, Ford and Allstate (see some of the problems we've solved here: http://www.abc.net.au/catalyst/stories/3296837.htm).

We're currently a team of 11, and we're looking for the outstanding developers, product managers and data scientists that will form the core team.

More information at http://www.kaggle.com/careers
